snippets.title: Text Other Tags

Text.name: is
Text.description: Changes the HTML tag used for rendering the text, altering its appearance.

Text.name: alignment_x
Text.description: Changes how the text is aligned within the containing box.

Text.name: sizing
Text.description: Changes how big the text will be rendered.

Text.name: transform
Text.description: Alters how the text casing is rendered.

Text.name: variation
Text.description: truncate removes parent container overflow from the render, clipping text with an ellipsis.
